br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector
Class NCLCausalConnector<C extends NCLCausalConnector,Co extends NCLCondition,Ac extends NCLAction,P extends NCLConnectorParam>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLIdentifiableElement
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector.NCLCausalConnector<C,Co,Ac,P>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, java.lang.Comparable<C>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLCausalConnector<C extends NCLCausalConnector,Co extends NCLCondition,Ac extends NCLAction,P extends NCLConnectorParam>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<C>

Esta classe define o elemento causalConnector da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define um conector de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
